Several residents were awake in their units and noticed the smoke coming from the basement. The fire alarms were activated, and the fire department arrived quickly to extinguish the blaze. The basement of the building primarily housed laundry equipment, and there were no injuries reported. Several residents were displaced temporarily, but were allowed to return to their units once it was determined that it was safe to do so.

The cause of the fire is not yet known, though it is being investigated by the fire department and the city's building codes department.
